entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:16 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:16 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
